businesses.name: Caffe Lil Italy
businesses.snippet_text: Had an amazing blueberry muffin from here. It was soft and moist, not too sweet, and not flaky or dry at all. Randomly stopped here, and so glad we did!

the rum and raisin isn't rummy enough, only downside!

businesses.name: Fort Point Market
businesses.snippet_text:
Between Ft Point Market and Trillium next door this is the craft beer mecca of Boston. 

Best beer selection in Boston bar none.
